mask_crop_subset

Source: R/mask_crop_subset.R
mask_crop_subset.Rd

mask and/or crop a Raster* based on a Polygon.

mask_crop_subset(r, p, mask = TRUE, crop = TRUE, idx = NULL)

Arguments

r

Raster* object
p

SpatialPolygon* object
mask

logical, TRUE to apply mask (default) using p, FALSE otherwise
crop

logical, TRUE to crop (default) using p, FALSE otherwise
idx

vector of strings indicating the layer indices to subset

Value

A Raster* object

Examples

# NOT RUN {
  r <- raster::brick('FWI_1980-2016.nc')
  p <- raster::getData(name = "GADM", country = "Italy", level = 0)
  mask_crop_subset(r, p, mask = TRUE, crop = TRUE)

# }
